message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you might be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $25000. Let me know if you'd like to proceed with the purchase!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. However, $25000 is beyond my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the lowest I can go on this product is $20000. It's a great deal considering the value it offers. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, but $20000 is still out of my budget. I can go up to $11000 for the product. Let me know if you can meet me at this price.

Hi Bob, I see you're trying to work within your budget. I can come down to $18000 for the product. This is the best I can do while still maintaining the value of the product. Let me know if this is something you can consider!
Hi Alice, thank you for the new offer. However, $18000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to increase my offer to $11500. This is the highest I can go. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle. I can lower the price to $16000, which is the lowest I can go while still valuing the product appropriately. Let me know if this works for you!

Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to meet me halfway. However, $16000 is still above my budget. I can go up to $11800. This is my final offer. If this doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider other options.
